attributes.action:
Plz give Knighthood to Ravi Singh of 
Khalsa Aid
attributes.additional_details:
He has set very big food service for Hungry 
Food delivery in UK
attributes.background:
He is head of  big charity Aid 
He has feed 2000 HGV truckers stuck at M20 motorway 
He has help flood area over whole world 
Without cast or colour

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
